zh.title: 玻利维亚发生军事政变
安提瓜和巴布达宣布独立
美国电影分级制度更新
北美自由贸易协定生效
中国青藏铁路全线贯通
飓风桑迪袭击美国东海岸

en.title: Bolivia's President Walter Guevara was overthrown in a coup.
Hurricane Klaus formed in the Atlantic Ocean.
The film "Witness" was released in the US.
The Maastricht Treaty came into effect, formally establishing the European Union.
North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) came into effect.
Final crew entered the International Space Station.
Ellen Johnson Sirleaf won Liberia's presidential election.
Hurricane Sandy caused extensive damage in the Northeastern US.
Lewis Hamilton won the United States Grand Prix.
COP27 UN Climate Change Conference began in Egypt.
